code: import{useCallback,useEffect,useState}from"react";import{useParams}from"react-router-dom";import MakeDetail from"../components/makingDetail";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Detail(){const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const{id}=useParams();const[movie,setMovie]=useState({});const getMovie=useCallback(async()=>{const json=await(await fetch(`https://yts.mx/api/v2/movie_details.json?movie_id=${id}`)).json();setMovie(json.data.movie);setLoading(false);},[id]);useEffect(()=>{getMovie();},[getMovie]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MakeDetail,{movie:movie,loading:loading});}export default Detail;
